doc.field: Education. Specifics (Fire Department High School). Personal. Reference.
Education. Specifics (Fire Department High School). Personal. Reference.

All appears to relate to training of some form for fire departments. Lots on FOMI (i.e. FDNY Officers Management Institute). Envelope with several certifications awarded Spadafora for courses completed. Folders, binders, loose docs on various specific courses or related (e.g. grants to do training; MA in homeland security offered by Naval Postgrad School; binder of presentation slides on "Delivering High Impact Instruction" by Leadership Research Institute, etc). Loose doc/emails re: Fire Department High School. A packet of materials re: diversity in the workplace training, specific context being FDNY's minority hiring issues (a DVD "Firehouse" movie on Black/white theme is in the box). Some is related to FD efforts at public training: binder on Fire Safety education. (Includes digital formats)
